Description: Fragment of rim of black-glazed pottery fishplate. Pendent rim; groove on top, filled with miltos; rest glazed. Incised inscription on top.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 588)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2154)
